landing.title: The Soviet Method for 100 Push-ups
landing.heroSubtitle: Don't train to failure. Train your nervous system with the "Grease the Groove" protocol and reach legendary strength levels.
landing.learnMore: Learn more about the method â†“
landing.methodP1: The idea is not to train to muscular exhaustion, but to
landing.methodP2: If you practice a movement many times with perfect form and without getting tired, your brain makes it more efficient. It's the principle of:
landing.methodP2Quote: Neurons that fire together, wire together
landing.methodP3: With this method, doing 100 push-ups becomes normal for your body because you've practiced the movement pattern thousands of times without wearing yourself out.
landing.protocolSubtitle: Follow these steps to transform your strength in 10 weeks.
landing.step1Desc: Do as many push-ups as you can in one set to technical failure. This is your starting point.
landing.step2Desc: Calculate half of your max. If you did 20, your sets will be 10. You should never feel fatigue or burn.
landing.step3DescEnd: of that number spread throughout the day, from morning to night.
landing.step4Desc: Train 6 days and rest 1. Every 2 weeks, test your max again and recalculate your 50%.
landing.techniqueSubtitle: Activate these three points before each rep for explosive strength.
landing.technique1Desc: Grip the floor and try to "open jars" by rotating your palms outward to activate your upper back.
landing.technique2Desc: Tense your abs as if you were about to be punched. Keep your spine protected and stable.
landing.technique3Desc: Squeeze them hard to connect your upper and lower body, creating a solid structure.
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join hundreds of people already using SovietFit to track their progress and reach 100 push-ups.
